name: Spooky Alley
description:
This is a game about scaring kids on Halloween. Play as Dracula or his pet Ghost and scare kids for their candy! 

Scare the kids to the exit safely. If you or the kids get killed too many times, you lose.

CONTROLS :

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump - Space

Scare - E

Transform - R

Change graphics - M

Credits:

Programmer: Chaki Behappy

Gamedesigner: BunnyGirlSenpai

Sound Design and Music: Dori Holly

Artist: KingdomPots

Special thanks to EasterKVin_27 for one of the pumpkin texture Easter eggs.
